title: Configuration Schema Design

title: P3-010: Implement Episode Cleanup Service
description:
EpisodeCleanupService implemented with full TDD approach.

Key Components:
1. IEpisodeCleanupService - Interface with CleanupChannelAsync and CleanupAllChannelsAsync
2. CleanupResult - DTO with ChannelId, EpisodesRemoved, BytesFreed
3. IFileService - Abstraction for file operations (testability)
4. EpisodeCleanupService - Implementation handling rolling window cleanup

Cleanup Logic:
- Orders completed episodes by published_at DESC
- Skips first N (channel.episode_count_config) to keep newest
- Removes remaining oldest episodes outside rolling window
- Deletes audio, video, thumbnail files from disk
- Marks episodes as deleted in database
- Tracks storage freed (file_size_audio + file_size_video)
- Handles errors gracefully

All 18 EpisodeCleanupService tests pass. All 472 project tests pass.

title: P3-008: Implement Background Refresh Worker
description:
Implemented RefreshWorker background service (IHostedService) that periodically refreshes all enabled channels.

Features implemented:
- IHostedService implementation with StartAsync/StopAsync
- Configurable poll interval (default: 1 hour, from config)
- Initial refresh on startup (doesn't wait for first interval)
- Error isolation: one channel failure doesn't stop other channels
- Graceful shutdown: StopAsync waits for in-flight refresh to complete
- CancellationTokenSource for cancellation propagation
- Idempotent StartAsync/StopAsync (handles duplicate calls safely)
- Thread-safe concurrent refresh prevention

Files created:
- src/Yallarhorn/Background/RefreshWorker.cs
- tests/Yallarhorn.Tests/Unit/Background/RefreshWorkerTests.cs

Tests: 12 new unit tests, all passing. Full test suite: 577 tests passing.

| Endpoint | Format | Description |
|----------|--------|-------------|
| `GET /feed/{channelId}/audio.rss` | RSS 2.0 | Audio podcast feed (MP3/M4A) |
| `GET /feed/{channelId}/video.rss` | RSS 2.0 | Video podcast feed (MP4) |
| `GET /feed/{channelId}/atom.xml` | Atom 1.0 | Audio feed in Atom format |

#### Combined/All-Channel Feeds (Route: `/feeds`)
| Endpoint | Format | Description |
|----------|--------|-------------|
| `GET /feeds/all.rss` | RSS 2.0 | Combined audio feed from all enabled channels (max 100 episodes) |
| `GET /feeds/all-video.rss` | RSS 2.0 | Combined video feed from all enabled channels |
| `GET /feeds/all.atom` | Atom 1.0 | Combined Atom audio feed |

#### Media File Serving
| Endpoint | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `GET /feeds/{channelId}/audio/{filename}` | Audio files (.mp3, .m4a, .aac, .ogg, .wav) |
| `GET /feeds/{channelId}/video/{filename}` | Video files (.mp4, .webm, .m4v) |
| `GET /feeds/{channelId}/thumbnails/{filename}` | Episode thumbnails |

### Content Types
- RSS feeds: `application/rss+xml; charset=utf-8`
- Atom feeds: `application/atom+xml; charset=utf-8`
- Audio MIME types: `audio/mpeg` (MP3), `audio/mp4` (M4A), `audio/aac`, `audio/ogg`, `audio/wav`
- Video MIME types: `video/mp4`, `video/webm`

### HTTP Caching
- **ETag**: SHA256 hash of feed content (hex-encoded)
- **Last-Modified**: Timestamp from feed generation
- **Cache-Control**: `public, max-age=300, stale-while-revalidate=60` (5 min cache + 1 min stale)
- **Conditional Requests**: Support for `If-None-Match` and `If-Modified-Since` headers returning 304 Not Modified

### Authentication (HTTP Basic Auth)

Authentication is **OPTIONAL** and disabled by default. When enabled:

#### Configuration (appsettings.json or YAML)
```json
"Auth": {
  "FeedCredentials": {
    "Enabled": true,
    "Username": "feed-user",
    "Password": "${FEED_PASSWORD}",
    "Realm": "Yallarhorn Feeds"
  }
}
```

#### Feed Auth Details
- **Realm**: `Yallarhorn Feeds`
- **Scheme**: HTTP Basic Authentication
- **Protected paths**: `/feed/*`, `/feeds/*`
- **Challenge header**: `WWW-Authenticate: Basic realm="Yallarhorn Feeds"`
- **Constant-time comparison**: Uses CryptographicOperations.FixedTimeEquals to prevent timing attacks

### Feed Format Details

#### RSS 2.0 (RssFeedBuilder)
- iTunes podcast namespace support: `http://www.itunes.com/dtds/podcast-1.0.dtd`
- Content namespace for HTML descriptions: `http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/`
- GUID format: `yt:{videoId}` (isPermaLink="false")
- Duration formatting: `HH:MM:SS` or `MM:SS`

#### Atom 1.0 (AtomFeedBuilder)
- Standard Atom namespace: `http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom`
- Self-referencing link with `rel="self"`
- Enclosure via `link rel="enclosure"` with length/type attributes
- ISO 8601 timestamps with Z suffix

### Key Files Analyzed
- `/src/Yallarhorn/Controllers/FeedController.cs` - Feed endpoint routing and caching
- `/src/Yallarhorn/Services/RssFeedBuilder.cs` - RSS 2.0 feed generation
- `/src/Yallarhorn/Services/AtomFeedBuilder.cs` - Atom 1.0 feed generation
- `/src/Yallarhorn/Services/CombinedFeedService.cs` - Combined feed aggregation
- `/src/Yallarhorn/Configuration/AuthOptions.cs` - Authentication configuration
- `/src/Yallarhorn/Authentication/BasicAuthHandler.cs` - HTTP Basic Auth implementation
